info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: A human readable descriptive text for this resource, up to 64 characters.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: A [webhook request](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/sms/twilio_request) is made to the Inbound Request URL when a message is received by any phone number or shortcode associated to your Messaging Service. Set to `null` to disable inbound messaging.
parameters.name: InboundRequestUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method used when making requests to the Inbound Request URL. Either `GET` or `POST`. Default value is `POST`.
parameters.name: InboundMethod

parameters.description: A request is made to the Fallback URL if an error occurs with retrieving or executing the TwiML from you Inbound Request URL.
parameters.name: FallbackUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method used when requesting the Fallback URL. Either `GET` or `POST`. Default value is `POST`.
parameters.name: FallbackMethod

parameters.description: A webhook request is made to the Status Callback to pass [status updates](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/message#sms-status-values) about your messages. These status updates let you know if your accepted message were successfully sent and delivered or if a [delivery related error](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/message#error-values) may have occurred.
parameters.name: StatusCallback

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable Sticky Sender on your Service Instance. Possible values are `true` and `false`. Default value is `true`.
parameters.name: StickySender

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable MMS Converter on your Service Instance. Possible values are `true` and `false`. Default value is `true`.
parameters.name: MmsConverter

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable [Smart Encoding](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/messaging/services-and-copilot#smart-encoding). Possible values are `true` and `false`. Default value is `true`.
parameters.name: SmartEncoding

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable [Fallback to Long Code](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/messaging/services-and-copilot#fallback-to-long-code). Possible values are `true` and `false`. Default value is `false`.
parameters.name: FallbackToLongCode

parameters.description: Configuration to enable or disable [Area Code Geomatch](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/messaging/services-and-copilot#area-code-geomatch). Possible values are `true` and `false`. Default value is `false`.
parameters.name: AreaCodeGeomatch

parameters.description: Configuration to set the [validity period](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/messaging/services-and-copilot#validity-period) of all messages sent from your Service, in seconds. Acceptable integers range from `1` to `14,400`.  Default value is `14,400`.
parameters.name: ValidityPeriod

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: An Alphanumeric Sender ID string, up to 11 characters. Valid characters are A-Z, a-z, 0-9, space and dash ( - ). An Alphanumeric Sender ID string cannot be comprised of only numbers.
parameters.name: AlphaSender

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: Phone Number SID for the Phone Number being added to the Service.
parameters.name: PhoneNumberSid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/services) to read the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/services) to create the resource under.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: SID of the ShortCode resource being added to the Service.
parameters.name: ShortCodeSid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/services) to delete the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the ShortCode resource to delete
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/services) to fetch the resource from.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the ShortCode resource to fetch
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique id of the [SMS Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/services/api) this session belongs to.
parameters.name: MessagingServiceSid

parameters.description: The human-readable name of this session. Optional.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: An optional string metadata field you can use to store any data you wish. The string value must contain structurally valid JSON if specified.  **Note** that if the attributes are not set "{}" will be returned.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: Identity of the session's creator. If the Session was created through the API, the value will be `system`
parameters.name: CreatedBy

parameters.description: The HTTP method to be used when sending a webhook request.
parameters.name: WebhookMethod

parameters.description: The list of webhook event triggers that are enabled for this Service.
parameters.name: WebhookFilters

parameters.description: The absolute url the pre-event webhook request should be sent to.
parameters.name: PreWebhookUrl

parameters.description: The absolute url the post-event webhook request should be sent to.
parameters.name: PostWebhookUrl

parameters.description: The number of retries in case of pre-event webhook request failures. Maximum 3 retries are allowed, the default value is 0.
parameters.name: PreWebhookRetryCount

parameters.description: The number of retries in case of post-event webhook request failures. Maximum 3 retries are allowed, the default value is 0.
parameters.name: PostWebhookRetryCount

parameters.description: The routing target of the webhook. Can be ordinary or route internally to Flex
parameters.name: Target

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this message.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this message.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The [identity](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/guides/identity) of the message's author. Defaults to `system`.
parameters.name: Author

parameters.description: A string metadata field you can use to store any data you wish. The string value must contain structurally valid JSON if specified.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated. `null` if the message has not been edited.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The contents of the message.
parameters.name: Body

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this message.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this message.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this message.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The [identity](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/guides/identity) of the message's author. Defaults to `system`.
parameters.name: Author

parameters.description: A string metadata field you can use to store any data you wish. The string value must contain structurally valid JSON if specified.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated. `null` if the message has not been edited.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The contents of the message.
parameters.name: Body

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this participant.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this participant.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: An optional string metadata field you can use to store any data you wish. The string value must contain structurally valid JSON if specified.  **Note** that if the attributes are not set "{}" will be returned.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The address of the Twilio phone number (or WhatsApp number, or Messenger Page ID) that the participant is in contact with. This field, together with user_address, is only null when the participant is interacting from a Chat endpoint (see the 'identity' field).
parameters.name: TwilioAddress

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created. This is most often useful when bulk-importing messages from another system, as the provided value will be trusted and displayed on SDK clients.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated. This is most often provided when bulk-importing messages from another system, as the provided value will be trusted and displayed on SDK clients.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: A unique string identifier for the session participant as [Chat User](https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/chat/rest/users). This parameter is non-null if (and only if) the participant is using the Programmable Chat SDK to communicate.
parameters.name: Identity

parameters.description: The address of the participant's device, e.g. a phone number or Messenger ID. Together with the Twilio Address, this determines a participant uniquely. This field (with twilio_address) is only null when the participant is interacting from a Chat endpoint (see the 'identity' field).
parameters.name: UserAddress

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this participant.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this participant.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this participant.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: An optional string metadata field you can use to store any data you wish. The string value must contain structurally valid JSON if specified.  **Note** that if the attributes are not set "{}" will be returned.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created. This is useful when bulk-importing messages from another system, as the provided value will be trusted and displayed on SDK clients.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this webhook.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this webhook.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: The target of this webhook.
parameters.name: Target

parameters.description: The absolute url the webhook request should be sent to.
parameters.name: Configuration.Url

parameters.description: The HTTP method to be used when sending a webhook request.
parameters.name: Configuration.Method

parameters.description: The list of events, firing webhook event for this Session.
parameters.name: Configuration.Filters

parameters.description: The list of keywords, firing webhook event for this Session.
parameters.name: Configuration.Triggers

parameters.description: The studio flow sid, where the webhook should be sent to.
parameters.name: Configuration.FlowSid

parameters.description: The number of retries in case of webhook request failures. Maximum 3 retries are allowed, the default value is 0.
parameters.name: Configuration.RetryCount

parameters.description: The message index for which and it's successors the webhook will be replayed. Not set by default
parameters.name: Configuration.ReplayAfter

parameters.description: The flag whether buffering should be applied to messages. Not set by default
parameters.name: Configuration.BufferMessages

parameters.description: The period of buffering messages. Default is 3000 ms.
parameters.name: Configuration.BufferWindow

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this webhook.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this webhook.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The unique id of the [Session](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sessions/api/session) for this webhook.
parameters.name: SessionSid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The absolute url the webhook request should be sent to.
parameters.name: Configuration.Url

parameters.description: The HTTP method to be used when sending a webhook request.
parameters.name: Configuration.Method

parameters.description: The list of events, firing webhook event for this Session.
parameters.name: Configuration.Filters

parameters.description: The list of keywords, firing webhook event for this Session.
parameters.name: Configuration.Triggers

parameters.description: The studio flow sid, where the webhook should be sent to.
parameters.name: Configuration.FlowSid

parameters.description: The number of retries in case of webhook request failures. Maximum 3 retries are allowed, the default value is 0.
parameters.name: Configuration.RetryCount

parameters.description: The flag whether buffering should be applied to messages. Not set by default
parameters.name: Configuration.BufferMessages

parameters.description: The period of buffering messages. Default is 3000 ms.
parameters.name: Configuration.BufferWindow

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The human-readable name of this session. Optional.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: An optional string metadata field you can use to store any data you wish. The string value must contain structurally valid JSON if specified.  **Note** that if the attributes are not set "{}" will be returned.
parameters.name: Attributes

parameters.description: The date that this resource was created.
parameters.name: DateCreated

parameters.description: The date that this resource was last updated.
parameters.name: DateUpdated

parameters.description: Identity of the session's creator. If the Session was created through the API, the value will be `system`
parameters.name: CreatedBy
